sentences.sContent: The tax puts obstacles in the way of companies trying to develop trade overseas.
sentences.sCn: 这项税收为想在海外发展贸易的公司设置了障碍。

sentences.sContent: Women still have to overcome many obstacles to gain equality.
sentences.sCn: 妇女要获得平等仍需克服重重障碍。

sentences.sContent: We want to remove all obstacles to travel between the two countries.
sentences.sCn: 我们想要消除在这两个国家之间旅行的所有障碍。

sentences.sContent: the single biggest obstacle to a Conservative victory in the next election
sentences.sCn: 保守党在下一届大选中获胜的最大障碍

sentences.sContent: There are formidable obstacles on the road to peace.
sentences.sCn: 通往和平的道路上存在难以逾越的障碍。

remMethod.val: ob(反) + sta(站) + (a)cle(表东西) → 反着站， 挡住了去路 → 障碍

trans.tranOther: something that makes it difficult to achieve some­thing
